mapper.select: SELECT DATE(c.reg_date) AS work_date, -- reg_date에서 날짜만 추출 c.employee_id, -- 사원번호 e.department_code AS department, -- 부서 e.position_code AS position, -- 직책 e.name, -- 이름 MIN(CASE WHEN work_status_code = '출근' THEN c.reg_date END) AS checkIn, MAX(CASE WHEN work_status_code = '퇴근' THEN c.reg_date END) AS checkOut, -- GROUP_CONCAT을 사용하여 work_status_code를 하나로 합친 후, 마지막 값만 추출 SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT work_status_code ORDER BY c.reg_date SEPARATOR ', '), ', ', -1) AS workStatus FROM t_commute c JOIN t_employee e ON c.employee_id = e.id -- 사원 테이블과 조인 GROUP BY c.employee_id, e.department, e.position, DATE(c.reg_date) -- 날짜별, 사용자별 그룹화 ORDER BY work_date DESC, c.employee_id;
